data.event: Though Claremont (the town) was founded in 1853, people first settled in Claremont Township in 1818, The year Illinois was admitted to the union.
Though Claremont (the town) was founded in 1853, people first settled in Claremont Township in 1818, The year Illinois was admitted to the union.
In December 1852 Claremont precinct was formed.
In 1853 he moved his store to a point along the Trace Road.

event.title: 1855, when the O & M Railroad was built

data.event: In 1855, when the O & M Railroad was built, he moved his store to a site along the railroad, and the present village of Claremont came into existence.
